text:
This is very boring text that as boring markup as well: strong, struck, emphasized, underlined, subtextm supertext, KNORA, internal link, Christmas 2016, and an interval one to three.
And here comes some more stuff: blue color, a number one (integer), a number two point 1 (decimal), a Boolean false
On the 31st of December 2016, we will have a party. Most probably it will be boring.
